snippet.title: World War Z - GOTY Edition Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC: http://wwzgame.com/buy?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=GOTYLaunchTrailer
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/wwzthegame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wwzgame/

World War Z: GOTY Edition and Marseille episode release today with explosive launch trailer
 
Grab World War Z Game of the Year Edition and experience every thrilling challenge, available now on PlayStation®4, Xbox One & PC
 
Saber Interactive and Focus Home Interactive have released the Marseille PvE episode for World War Z, the best-selling co-op shooter inspired by Paramount Pictures’ blockbuster film. Watch the explosive Launch Trailer of this action-packed episode, featuring four new characters taking on three new story-driven missions set on France’s coastal shores.
 
Marseille brings the most intense solo & coop action yet
 
“Marseille” is available today for Season Pass owners and as part of the new World War Z Game of the Year Edition, which bundles together the full base game and all its Season Pass DLC. World War Z Game of the Year Edition is available on PC via the Epic Games Store, as well as on Xbox One and PlayStation®4.
 
GOTY Edition features all Episodes, DLC packs and modes
 
Beyond the base game and new “Marseille” episode, World War Z Game of the Year Edition features several premium weapon and character skin packs. Players also get a year’s worth of free content added to World War Z since it launched, including the wave-based Horde Mode Z, Xbox One-PC crossplay, bonus PvE missions and enemies, weekly challenge mode, extreme difficulty setting and more. Players can look forward to a new playable class with unique abilities still to come in a free update later this year.
 
The Marseille DLC is also available to purchase individually on Xbox One and PlayStation®4. Owners of the standard edition of World War Z on the Epic Games Store can grab the new episode by purchasing the Game of the Year Edition upgrade, featuring the game’s full DLC.
